mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_verification_code (mobile, code, type, retry_count, status, create_time) VALUES (#{mobile}, #{code}, #{type}, #{retryCount}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_verification_code SET retry_count = retry_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND retry_count < #{maxRetryCount}
UPDATE tb_verification_code SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id} AND status != #{status}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_verification_code WHERE mobile = #{mobile} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_verification_code WHERE mobile = #{mobile} AND type = #{type} AND DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
